body_content.explanation: caused or created by erosion (= damage to soil, stone, etc. by waves, rain, or wind):
examples: There is an erosional arch at one end of the beach.
This part of the region has all the classic erosional features of a limestone area.

body_content.explanation: causing erosion (= damage to soil, stone, etc. by waves, rain, or wind):
examples: This is a landscape which has been shaped by the erosional action of water.
They are studying the erosional processes of wind in the desert.
